summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 75W, page 177 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Portion of Tract B, Block 13, Fauntleroy Add. lying between a line 55 ft. west of and parallel with the west margin of 45th Ave. S.W. and a northeasterly extension of the northwesterly line of the southeasterly half of Lot 13, Block 13.
